text: Outside missions , the player characters rest in a camp , where units can be customized and character growth occurs Alongside the main story missions are character @-@ specific sub missions relating to different squad members There are also love simulation elements related to the game 's two main heroines , although they take a very minor role

The game 's battle system , the <unk> system , is carried over directly from <unk> Chronicles A character can only act once per @-@ turn , but characters can be granted multiple turns at the expense of other characters ' turns Each character has a field and distance of movement limited by their Action Gauge Up to nine characters can be assigned to a single mission Each character has specific " Potentials " , skills unique to each character

The game takes place during the Second Europan War " The three main characters are No 7 Kurt Irving , an army officer falsely accused of treason who wishes to redeem himself ; Ace No 1 Imca , a female Darcsen heavy weapons specialist who seeks revenge against the Valkyria who destroyed her home ; and No 13 Riela <unk> , a seemingly jinxed young woman who is unknowingly a descendant of the Valkyria
At the same time , elements within Gallian Army Command move to erase the Nameless in order to protect their own interests
Now owing allegiance to none other than themselves , the 422nd confronts Dahau and destroys the <unk> weapon Each member then goes their separate ways in order to begin their lives anew

Concept work for Valkyria Chronicles III began after development finished on Valkyria Chronicles II in early 2010 , with full development beginning shortly after this The director of Valkyria Chronicles II , Takeshi Ozawa , returned to that role for Valkyria Chronicles III Development work took approximately one year Its story was darker and more somber than that of its predecessor

The majority of material created for previous games , such as the <unk> system and the design of maps , was carried over A part of this upgrade involved creating unique polygon models for each character 's body The newer systems were decided upon early in development The character designs were done by <unk> Honjou , who had worked on the previous Valkyria Chronicles games The main color of the Nameless was black As with the previous Valkyria games , Valkyria Chronicles III used the <unk> graphics engine The anime opening was produced by Production I

The music was composed by Hitoshi Sakimoto , who had also worked on the previous Valkyria Chronicles games An early theme he designed around his original vision of the project was rejected He <unk> the main theme about seven times through the music production due to this need to reassess the game The rejected main theme was used as a hopeful tune that played during the game 's ending While Sakimoto was most used to working with synthesized music , he felt that he needed to incorporate live instruments such as orchestra and guitar The guitar was played by Mitsuhiro Ohta , who also arranged several of the later tracks The game 's opening theme song , " If You Wish for " ( <unk> , <unk> Kimi ga <unk> Nara ) , was sung by Japanese singer May 'n Its lyrics were written by Seiko Fujibayashi , who had worked on May 'n on previous singles

In September 2010 , a teaser website was revealed by Sega , hinting at a new Valkyria Chronicles game In its September issue , Famitsu listed that Senjō no Valkyria 3 would be arriving on the PlayStation Portable Its first public appearance was at the 2010 Tokyo Game Show ( TGS ) , where a demo was made available for journalists and attendees The game was released January 27 , 2011 Multiple DLC maps , featuring additional missions and recruitable characters , were released between February and April 2011 An expanded edition of the game , Valkyria Chronicles III Extra Edition , released on November 23 , 2011 People who also owned the original game could transfer their save data between versions
